San Francisco fire predictions -
https://data.sfgov.org/Public-Safety/Fire-Incidents/wr8u-xric/data

The dry air of California increases the likeliness of fires starting, this is a large factor in why california faces wildfires year after year. By using the data provided by the city of San Francisco, I hope to be able to map out the areas most likely to go up in flames.

App engagement on android devices -
https://www.kaggle.com/lava18/google-play-store-apps

Smartphone apps have greatly affected how society consumes content. Even the smallest apps can deliver loads of information to consumers. With the information provided by this dataset I hope to be able to predict which apps are most likely to be successful and why.
